dimension: 4 3/8 x 21 1/2 x 29 in. (11.1 x 54.6 x 73.7 cm) (overall, irregular)
title: Model for a Lake Minnetonka Residence
description: three dimensional model of a house and guest house with land elevation represented through the layering of matboard; 18 wire trees represent main trees on property
